source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Learn to Sew : Make Buttoned Pillow Cover & Zip  Pencil Case
items.headline: Learn and apply essential sewing techniques: seams, button, buttonholes zips. Make your own pillow cover and pencil case
objectives_summary: Start and stop stitching properly (Reverse stitching)
Understand seams
Know how to sew with an even seam allowance

items.title: Watercolor Techniques for Abstract Painting

visible_instructors.job_title: 2-Time Teacher Of The Year & Award-Winning Painter
visible_instructors.title: Steve Curl
visible_instructors.name: Steve

items.headline: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee! Features a 2-time Teacher Of The Year and award-winning painter
objectives_summary: Create rough thumbnail sketches to plan an abstract composition.
Use simple objects as subject matter for an abstract painting.
Utilize both positive and negative space to play with spatial relationships.

items.title: Step By Step Watercolor Landscapes

visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer
visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe
visible_instructors.name: Mandar

items.headline: Painting Morning & Evening Scenes
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint step by step in watercolor.
Paint beautiful landscapes based on photo references.
Learn the watercolor techniques such as wet in wet, wet on dry and color lifting.

items.title: Make your own decorative planter | woodwork for beginners
items.headline: Learn how to build a 45cm x 45cm decorative wooden planter | DIY skills for the complete beginner
objectives_summary: Build a decorative 45cm by 45cm wooden planter
Develop basic DIY skills
Build something beautiful for your garden that you can be proud of :-)

items.title: Easy Guide to Brush Pen Calligraphy
items.headline: Get Started, Write Away!
objectives_summary: Basic strokes of brush pen calligraphy
How to calligraph the lowercase alphabet a to z
How to calligraph the lowercase alphabet A to Z

items.title: Oak Framing
items.headline: How to make a traditional roof truss using woodworking & carpentry techniques old and new. Learn about tools and methods
objectives_summary: How to make a traditional timber roof truss using oak framing techniques that are centuries old. Learn about old and new tools and how to use them, discover the techniques to help you develop your woodworking skills and take them to a higher level.
Hand and power tool use, marking out, timber selection, joint design, peg making, draw boring, datum lines and much more

items.title: Learn to draw in 24 hours !

visible_instructors.job_title: Conseillé en marketing et business développeur
visible_instructors.name: Docteur
visible_instructors.title: Docteur Abel

items.headline: Learn to draw quickly and effortlessly in just 24 hours
objectives_summary: Learn how to draw in 24 hours !
sketching easy in 24 hours
You learn to draw step by step in a very fast time !

items.title: Painting with Acrylics for Beginners - Beach House Canvas
items.headline: A complete step by step guide to creating your own decorative painting in Acrylics.
objectives_summary: Painting with Acrylics for Beginners.
A  complete step by step guide to creating your own decorative painting in acrylics.
Learn about the basics of colour and how to mix your own.

items.title: Creativity Workshop For Unlimited Flow Of New Ideas
items.headline: Empowerment Through Line, Space, Shape, and Color
objectives_summary: Have a constant flow of new ideas.
Explore nine exercises where each one of them can be a stand-alone practice that can be used many times you will not get bored
Know how to use your surroundings to unblock your creativity

items.title: Painting Wild Places with Watercolors: Tranquil Waters

visible_instructors.title: Gary Spetz
visible_instructors.name: Gary
visible_instructors.job_title: Signature Member of the National Watercolor Society

items.headline: Step-by-step instructional videos with a downloadable Color Painting Reference and full-size Traceable Drawing Guide.
objectives_summary: Successfully paint a bold, dynamic, detailed watercolor landscape.
Gain confidence in controlling the sometimes unwieldy characteristic of watercolor.

items.title: DIY Flower Making 4 Video Course - Beginner to Intermediate
items.headline: A beautiful skill, made easy to learn at home.
objectives_summary: Dough Making at Home
Color Mixing with Oil Paints
Flower Making - by hand and with tools

items.title: Beginners Guide to Shading Your Drawings
items.headline: Everything You Need to Know About the Basics of Shading
objectives_summary: How to shade their drawings for depth and form
How to approach shading
Which tools to use: Types of pencils (graphite vs. charcoal), paper

items.title: Watercolor Painting for Beginners - Snowy Mountains
items.headline: Using the Paper White to Paint Snow
objectives_summary: Watercolor painting
Landscape painting
Snow Painting techniques

items.title: Learn to Paint a Church in the English Country in Watercolor
items.headline: Learn a completely unique way to paint watercolour with Colin Bradley. Follow along with Step by Step lessons
objectives_summary: Learn a new approach to painting watercolour
Apply these new techniques to their own work
Understand building colours and layers with watercolor

items.title: Caves to Castles: Introducing Ancient to Medieval Art
items.headline: A journey into the aesthetics of the ancient world
objectives_summary: Basic cultural background and art analysis from Ancient through Medieval periods

items.title: A beginners guide to lock picking
items.headline: Learn how to pick locks from a certified locksmith.
objectives_summary: Introductory lockpicking and the defeating of locks.
